channel.title: 667 compiler help
channel.description:
My server compiler has these commands.... @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java echo compiled Player folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/InterfaceManager.java echo compiled Player folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java echo compiled Server folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java echo compiling Dialogues "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/Commands.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/utils/*.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java echo Compiled all Successfully pause
With these everytime I compile, nothing changes on my server.. Can someone please help with this?
Thanks, Bull Dozzr

item.title: 667 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Put it in quotes for easier reading and I’m sure someone…would love to help. :palm:

You don’t provide help anyways, so take your response elsewhere.

OP, have you considered using an IDE:
http://eclipse.org
http://netbeans.org

Also, when running your server make sure you’re running it from the bin folder

Read full topic

item.title: 667 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @bull_dozzr bull dozzr
item.description:
@bull_dozzr wrote:

My server compiler has these commands…
@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java
echo compiled Player folder
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/InterfaceManager.java
echo compiled Player folder
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java
echo compiled Server folder
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/.java
echo compiling Dialogues
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/.java
echo compiled Main Server Folder
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/Commands.java
echo compiled Main Server Folder
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/utils/.java
echo compiled Main Server Folder
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/.java
echo Compiled all Successfully
pause

With these everytime I compile, nothing changes on my server… Can someone please help with this?

Thanks, Bull Dozzr

Read full topic
